They are generally considered progressive rock, with jazz, punk, and Latin influences. They are known for their wild, energetic and improvised live shows, as well as their usually concept-based studio albums."

Albums -
 Studio -
  De-Loused in the Comatorium (2003)
  Frances the Mute (2005)

Format -
 Most in 224k ABR MP3, Tremulant in 192k ABR
 All cleanly ID3v2 tagged

General notes -
This torrent contains all but 1 album (Live from 2003) in the current diskography for The Mars Volta.  I was unable to locate a copy of Tremulant in stores, and resorted to eMusic to locate it (hence it&#039;s lower bitrate).
This torrent is NOT a RAR recompression of the files, just the files themselves, so it&#039;s easier to pick through to download parts if you just need to fill in your collection of this excellent band.  Please, I highly encourage you to purchase these albums after reviewing, as they are excellent works and the band truly deserves your support. :)
